Title: Imposes the earnings tax on nonresidents
Summary: Authorizes cities to impose the earnings tax on nonresidents.
LawCode: Add Art 2-E §§25-m - 25-o, Gen City L; amd §§1301 & 1305, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law and the tax law, in relation to imposing the earnings tax on nonresidents
